DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , control , parallel group , assessor-blinded study compare two colon cleanse preparation colonoscopy . Subjects meet inclusion exclusion criterion randomize assigned one two study group : Group I ( PicoPrep ) Group II ( Mannitol ) . In Group I , subject take one sachet PicoPrep day colonoscopy , another sachet day colonoscopy . In Group II , subject take Bisacodyl day colonoscopy , Mannitol day colonoscopy .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing Picoprep With Mannitol Bisacodyl Colon Cleansing Preparation Colonoscopy
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 18 60 year Subjects schedule elective colonoscopy Women childbearing potential use least one highly effective contraceptive method Subjects able understand instruction Informed consent sign Hypersensitivity active ingredient Female participant pregnant positive blood pregnancy test Acute surgical abdomen Previous colorectal surgery Gastrointestinal ( GI ) surgery GI diseases , active inflammatory bowel disease , colon disease Ascites/hepatic cirrhosis , cardiac disease , advance pulmonary renal disease Use laxatives antidiarrheal agent 72 hour prior screen Significant alteration laboratory value disease could interfere result
